name: barefacedly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that does not show any shame about, or does not try to hide, your bad behaviour: The employee was bare-facedly stealing money from the company. He drew graffiti onto the desk and then, when he was caught, barefacedly lied about it. Related word
barefaced
More examplesFewer examplesThe league has rules about what kind of contact one player can make with another, but many players barefacedly flout those rules right in view of the officials. He barefacedly told his employees that they wouldn't be getting the holiday bonuses they were promised.
